medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Subject 1 presented with 2 years of amenorrhea after stopping birth control pills, with a history of regular menstrual cycles complicated by painful ovarian cysts. Subject 2 had a 1-year history of amenorrhea, hot flashes, vaginal dryness, and poor sleep, following a normal pregnancy 3 years prior. Subject 3 reported a 9-month history of amenorrhea after discontinuation of birth control pills, with a background of irregular menstrual cycles and menometrorrhagia since menarche at age 13.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypothyroidism in Subjects 1 and 2, both treated with thyroid hormone replacement. Subject 1 also has a history of painful ovarian cysts. Subject 3 has no relevant past medical history noted.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of multiple sclerosis in Subjects 2 and 3, with Subject 3 also reporting premature graying and hypothyroidism.
medical_history.social_history: Subject 1 did not smoke. Subject 2 stopped smoking 5 years before presentation. Subject 3's social history is not specified.
